alert.note: Alert for Huron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Huron County through 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles north of Port Hope to near Port Austin to near Caseville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kinde around 645 PM EDT. Port Hope around 655 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Pinnebog, Port Crescent State Park, Redman, Filion, Huron City, Helena, Rapson and Grindstone City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
